title: (x) elfin / elegant serif w/ (upright) cursive elements & swashes - Nyte {Jan}
content:
I love this face. Does anyone know what it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018020404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elfin_6246.jpg)
author: dongura

comments.content:
It’s either Estra or, if the sample is from New York Times Magazin, it’s Nyte.

[http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018020404/http:/www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4 "http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=4")  
 [http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018020404/http:/www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62 "http://www.dstype.com/index.php?id=62")
It is from the NY Times. So Nyte it is. Thanks much
